jml.structures
Class BitArray

java.lang.Object
  jml.structures.BitArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class BitArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Title: BitArray

Description: Stores the positions with a value different of the default value, the values are bits

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

private  int[] data
          Integer array used to store the bits
private  int n
          The number of bits in the bit array

Method Detail

random

public static BitArray random(int limit)
Utilizada para retornar un BitArray

Parameters:
limit - Utilizado para asignarle el tamaño al BitArray con el numero de bit requeridos para represnetar su valor
Returns:
BitArray de tamaño igual al numero de bit para representar limit y contiene 0 y 1 aleatorios

subBitArray

public BitArray subBitArray(int start)
Returns a sub bit array of the bit array starting from the position start until the end of the bit array.

A = 1000111001

A.subBitArray( 4 ) = 111001

A.subArray( 0 ) = 1000111001

A.subArray( 10 ) = empty bit array

Parameters:
start - The start position
Returns:
A sub bit array of the bit array starting from the position start until the end of the bit array.

subBitArray

public BitArray subBitArray(int start,
                            int end)
Returns the sub bit array of the bit array starting at the position start and the previous to the position end-1. If the end position is greater than the last position of the array then the function will return only the last bits.

A = 1000111001

A.subBitArray( 4, 7 ) = 111

A.subArray( 0, 4 ) = 1000

A.subArray( 7, 11 ) = 001

Parameters:
start - The start position of the substring
end - The end position + 1 of the subarray
Returns:
The sub bit array of the bit array starting at the position start and the previous to the position end-1.

leftShift

public void leftShift(int k)
Shifts the bit array to the left in k bits. The remaining bits will be set to zero.

A = 1010011011

A.left_shift( 3 ) = 0011011000

Parameters:
k - The number of bits to be shifted

rightShift

public void rightShift(int k)
Shifts the bit array to the right in k bits. The remaining bits will be set to zero

A = 1010011011

A.right_shift( 3 ) = 0001010011

Parameters:
k - The number of bits to be shifted

and

public void and(BitArray arg2)
Performs the and operator between the bit array and the given bit array.

A = 10011001011

B = 0101010101

A.and( B ) = 00010001011

B.and( A ) = 0001000101

Parameters:
arg2 - The array used to perform the and operator

A.or( B ) = 11011101011

B.or( A ) = 1101110101

Parameters:

A = 10011001011

B = 0101010101

A.xor( B ) = 11001100001

B.xor( A ) = 1100110000

Parameters:

A = 10001001

A.not() = 01110110
